entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
